Package com.oracle.coherence.spring.event.liveevent.handler

Class FederationEventHandler<E extends com.tangosol.net.events.Event<T>,T extends Enum<T>>

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.coherence.spring.event.liveevent.handler.EventHandler<E,T>
com.oracle.coherence.spring.event.liveevent.handler.ServiceEventHandler<E,T>
com.oracle.coherence.spring.event.liveevent.handler.FederationEventHandler<E,T>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of Event this interceptor accepts
T - the enumeration of event types E supports
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.tangosol.net.events.EventDispatcherAwareInterceptor<E>, com.tangosol.net.events.EventInterceptor<E>
Direct Known Subclasses:
FederatedChangeEventHandler, FederatedConnectionEventHandler, FederatedPartitionEventHandler
public abstract class FederationEventHandler<E extends com.tangosol.net.events.Event<T>,T extends Enum<T>> extends ServiceEventHandler<E,T>
Abstract base class for all observer-based federation interceptors.
Since:
3.0
Author:
Gunnar Hillert
